biotools.summary: Mzkit is an open source raw data file toolkit for mass spectrometry data visualization and analysis, provides by the BioNovoGene. The features of mzkit inlcudes: raw data file content viewer(XIC/TIC/Mass spectrum plot), MS-imaging, ms-spectrum tree analysis, build molecule network, formula de-novo search and de-novo annotation.
